title: M8: Chop soup
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 5 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS:  if you are using MutNMT you can link this activity to the corpora selector in section Train for the 3 types of sets and for what the system is doing when launching the training and asking you to wait. All of these concepts are explained in chapter 8 of the book.
